content.rendered:
(1) We offer Nationwide Delivery services and Installation by our own personnel within the Greater London area.

(2) Standard delivery times are dependent on the product however we normally request that you should allow up to 21 working days for delivery.

(3) Where our fabrication is entirely bespoke, fabrication times may vary. Hence it is prudent not to arrange any installation until you are in receipt of the actual goods as we cannot be held responsible for any consequential costs caused by unexpected delays.

Additionally stated lead times are only estimates and for information only and are not contractual and can increase or decrease depending on current production times, gate designs, delivery area, as well as for operational reasons. We can provide a current lead time at the time of placing your order.

(4) If you require specific delivery requirements or require an update on your order, please contact us.

(5) We are able to offer an Express Delivery service for faster delivery. The additional charges which apply are:

(I) Pedestrian Gates and Side Gates Delivery services : approx 10 working days – £50 additional charge

(II) Driveway/ Sliding Gates Delivery services : approx 10 working days – £120 additional charge

(6) Our Standard Estimated Delivery services times are:

(I) Pedestrian and Side Gates: approx 21 working days

(II) Driveway/Sliding Gates: approx 20 working days

(7) Prices: may vary, depending on weight of metal required together with additional labour.

(8) Most of our products are delivered within the times quoted, however, sometimes delays in delivery may occur depending on location, powder coating, etc.

(9) Our products are dispatched with Tuffnels or Trans Liar service or alternatively by our vans.

(10) We guarantee that we will never be undersold and offer a Price Match Guarantee. Our Guarantee only applies to identical designs and materials. Proof of price is required.

Please call us on 0208 964 2857 for our Delivery services times or any other questions regarding delivery or Big ferro products and services .
